name: Frontiers
tag_list: academia, research, science, research-papers, publishing, social, network, open-access, peer-review, sharing, group, collaboration, community
overview:
Frontiers is a web-based academic publishing and social networking platform for scientists, researchers and everybody around academia.

Frontiers publishes high-quality, peer-reviewed scientific research articles freely accessible to anybody in the world. The Frontiers editorial boards are composed by over 25,000 world-renowned scientists. It is the fastest growing open-access publisher world-wide with over 3 million monthly page views. The web-based publishing platform allows semi-automated and efficient submission, processing, peer-reviewing and publishing of research articles.

In 2012 Frontiers launched its social networking platform for researchers and everybody interested in academia. It enables researchers to create conferences, blogs, news, announcements, to interact with each other and share their publications and other scientific content.

Frontiers is the first IT company to combine academic open-access publishing and social networking for researchers.
